hero.core_tension: Deciding whether to move a protected set of limited/new SKUs into the two weeks before Thanksgiving to capture early intent (lift vs. cannibalization and margin preservation).
hero.setting: Dim backstage-studio hybrid: matte black worktable against a deep charcoal backdrop, negative space around subjects, hints of concrete and stage curtains.
hero.persona: Store operations lead and studio producer in collaboration — two silhouettes leaning across the table (operator with a worn utility jacket; studio producer with a linen notebook).
hero.action: Hands arrange a short run of physical SKU samples and handwritten cohort cards; a second hand lifts a translucent play sheet into the light to compare sequences.
hero.urgency_symbol: A taut, thin filament stretched between two lit panes that frays into fine sparks where the decision will 'snap' — symbolic tension indicating timing sensitivity without a clock.
props: handwritten A/B cohort cards, single-page printouts
hero.lighting: Moody, low-key dark-mode: deep shadows, a single cool tungsten key on the samples, rim light to separate silhouettes, heavy negative space.
hero.mood: Tense, disciplined collaboration — calculated risk framed as creative problem solving.
hero.alt: Two collaborators lean over a matte black table in a dark studio; hands arrange tagged SKU samples (S1–S5) under a single cool spotlight while a thin filament stretches taut between two lit panes, symbolizing the timing decision.

signal_map.structure: Concentric rings with radial arcs and a sparse lattice — tokens sit on an outer ring (campaign moves) with arcs pulling inward toward a central ledger plane.
elements: token S1 — small boxed sample on outer ring (pre-Thanksgiving SKU test)
token S2 — miniature parade pennant on outer ring (flagship drop)
token S3 — tiny pop-up storefront model (co-brand trial)
token S4 — brushed-metal cube (AI allocation/pricing pilot)
token S5 — demo kiosk miniature (pre-Black Friday high-ticket push)
central ledger plane — textured matte card representing measured metrics
signal_map.motion: Subtle inward pull: arcs pulse toward the central ledger with staggered timing; one arc shows a slower pull (cannibalization risk) while another spikes quickly (early-lift signal).
signal_map.palette: Dark-mode base: charcoal and matte black with accent neon edges per signal (S1 teal, S2 amber, S3 magenta, S4 electric blue, S5 warm gold); materials: matte rubber, brushed steel, velvet token pads.
signal_map.alt: Abstract signal map in a dark palette showing concentric rings and radial arcs; five tokens (S1–S5) sit on the outer ring with pulsing arcs drawing them to a central matte ledger, each token rim-lit a different accent color.
